skipping vpn, going to bluetooth

15 May 2007 I've been doing other geeky stuff lately, but more about that later.

I decided to skip the OpenVPN trials and focus on the bluetooth interconnectivity for now.
I'm installing kMobileTools, bluetooth chat, bluetooth obex client, kbluetoothd, bluetooth obex server and bluetooth file sharing.
